text:
In high school, my first idea was to do medical studies. But because you need to be able to learn informations by heart, it was not the right choice for me. I like doing exercises and using what I have learned, it is easier for me to learnywjs by using the notions.
Then because i like mathematics and computer sciences, i thought of getting into an engineering school. My family and particulary my mom helped me to look for the studies I would like. During my last year, I was able to visit the ESIR because i already lived in Paris. I really liked the fact that we were learning and using subject in biology, medicine, and mathematics, computer science, electronics. I found a mix of what I like. So I looked for other engineering school in Paris with the same studies. I also visited the two high school of Paris where there is a "CPGE"/prépa in physics.
At the end of my last year I chose the prepa. I was not accepted in ESIR and had to wait a long time to maybe have another school in Paris. Moreover, because I was not sure of making the choice of a biomedical engineering school after discovering it so recently. It was too hard to decide to go to a school for 5 years I thought I would like, when the previous year I did not even thought of engineering schools.
During my 2 years in prepa, I was still looking for the school I could get into thanks to the contests at the end. I had still in mind ESIR, Polytech in Paris and I discovered other school wich had biomedical engineering formations.
Because of my grades at the contest, my first choice has been the ESIR.
